arabic: وَ اِنِّيْ لِمَا اَنْزَلْتَ اِلَيَّ مِنْ خَيْرٍ فَقِيْرٍ
translation: I seek forgiveness of Allah and I turn to Him
O Allah, forgive me and have mercy on me
help me, and avert from me, and grant me well-being
And, Surely I am in need of any good You may send down on me
Blessed be Allah the Lord of the Worlds
transliteration: wa innī limā anzalta ilayya min khayrin faqīr
